Name: Tenuta di Renieri Chianti Classico Riserva, 2020
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-Tuscany, Italy - A poised and focused Chianti Classico Riserva with black cherry, subtle sage and bark aromas and flavors. Medium-bodied with juicy fruit, firm tannins and a fresh finish. Bright and vivid at the end.

Name: 1858 by Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon Paso Robles
Product_Highlights: Paso Robles, CA- From Caymus Vineyards. Black cherry and plum hit the front of the palate. Baking spice, with touches of vanilla and oak accompany the fruit while adding layers of complexity. Balanced with light acidity and fine tannins on the finish.

Name: Ed Edmundo Malbec, 2023
Product_Highlights: Argentina- This Malbec has sweet aromas of blackberries and plums with an elegant touch of smoke and vanilla. Velvety texture and a sweet long aftertaste. Pairs well with grilled meats and seasoned cuisines.

Name: Ed Edmundo Cabernet Sauvignon, 2024
Product_Highlights: The Tasting Panel-Argentina - Mendoza - The hearty tannins on this Cabernet linger, animated with a fruity veneer of dark ripe raspberries, plum and black cherries. A burst of flavors emerges, including tobacco leaf, plush leather, and a gentle hint of clove.

Name: Caymus Cabernet Sauvignon Napa 50th Anniversary, 2022
Product_Highlights: Wine Spectator-California - Napa Valley - A creamy, forward style, with a core of warmed raspberry and boysenberry preserves infused liberally with mocha and melted licorice. Shows a late flicker of chaparral. This is meant for near-term hedonism. Drink now through 2034.

Name: St. Giorgio Toscana IGT Super Tuscan, 2019
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-Tuscany, Italy - I like the creamy and spicy edge to the red fruit, coming from a well-judged use of oak. Medium-bodied with a nice line of red fruit and lightly firm tannins flowing through the finish. Twist of vanilla at the end from the mild oak.

Name: Caliveda Pinot Noir, 2022
Product_Highlights: Beverage Dynamics-California - Bursting with flavor on the palate, this pinot has medium purple color with notes of juicy black cherry and pomegranate cola, rounded out with an enticing vanilla note.

Name: 1858 by Caymus Vineyards Red Blend
Product_Highlights: Beverage Dynamics-California - Made by Caymus Vineyards. A dark maroon color greets you upon pouring this plush wine. Baked black and blue fruits, warm spice, and sumptuous but soft tannins and toasted wood on the finish. This is a smooth but structured, approachable wine from the Wagner Family.

Name: Pazzia Primitivo Puglia IGP, 2022
Product_Highlights: Luca Maroni-Italy - Apulia - The softness and pleasantness of the combination between fruit and spices on the palate make the sensory expressions of this wine powerful and harmonious. A wine characterized by majestic abundance, strength and pleasing aromas...

Name: Olema Cabernet Sauvignon Sonoma County, 2023
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-California - Sonoma County - Wow, so fresh, flavorful and drinkable despite intense concentration and moderate to full tannins. A great value and very well balanced. Sourced from very good sites on Moon Mountain, Sonoma Mountain and Dry Creek Valley. Blended with 12% malbec.

Name: Old Winery Road Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Sonoma, 2022
Product_Highlights: Beverage Dynamics-California - Napa Valley - Grapes from both Napa and Sonoma Counties were used by the winemakers at Buena Vista to showcase a seamless 50/50 blend. Hints of cedar spice with blueberry, blackberry, and black currant notes on the palate. Fruit forward, rich and well-integrated.

Name: Samuel Robert Pinot Noir Willamette Vineyard Reserve, 2023
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-Oregon-Willamette Valley-A rich aromatic power trio of dates, figs and aged balsamic is accented by spicy bits of cinnamon, clove and coriander. The wine's flavor profile is similar, as dark plums are joined by orange zest and chai tea spices. Fine, grainy tannins hold it al together.

Name: Cruz Alta Malbec Reserve by Rutini Wines
Product_Highlights: Mendoza, Argentina- This 100% Malbec is sourced from three iconic high altitude vineyards in the famed region of Mendoza. Revealing rich black fruit and red plum aromas, a spicy, structured palate and a long firm finish. Classic match with grilled meats.

Name: Angeline Pinot Noir California, 2022
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-California - Sonoma County - Aromas of fresh baked strawberry pie and cherries follow through to a medium body with nice and bright red fruit and an easy finish. Remains fresh at the end. Drink now. Screw cap.

Name: Harvester Cabernet Sauvignon Paso Robles by Hope Family Wines
Product_Highlights: Beverage Dynamics-Paso Robles, Central Coast, CA- Full-bodied with inviting flavors of red berries, spice, and velvety tannins; a densely-packed Cabernet that is defined by its soft, luscious finish. Crafted by Austin Hope of Hope Family Wines.

Name: Chateau Lamothe Vincent Reserve Bordeaux, 2022
Product_Highlights: Decanter-France - Bordeaux - Bordeaux/Bordeaux Superieur - Decanter World Wine Awards: An alluring splendour of smoky oak and lip-smacking blackberry pie which nicely entangles with the swaddling tannins, polished acidity and impeccably smooth texture. Long and delicious.

Name: Renieri Invetro Super Tuscan, 2021
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-Italy - Tuscany - A crunchy wine with blackberry and black truffle character, a medium body, juicy tannins and a flavorful finish. Balanced fruit. From organically grown grapes. 50% sangiovese, 25% merlot and 25% cabernet sauvignon. Fun and delicious now.

Name: Mascota Vineyards Unanime Cabernet, 2020
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-Argentina - Mendoza - A pretty ripe nose with some baked plums, cherries and hints of sweet spices and white pepper. Pretty plush and juicy on the medium-bodied palate with a very tight and tense finish. Fine-grained and long.

Name: Oak Ridge Zinfandel Ancient Vine Estate Grown Lodi, 2022
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-California - Lodi - highlights a mixture of buoyant and concentrated red plum, boysenberry, cracked black peppercorn and toasty oak. Flavors dance across the palate, offering baked raspberry-blueberry pie, star anise, cardamom and candied lemon zest on the finish...

Name: Asua Rioja Crianza, 2021
Product_Highlights: Vinous-Rioja, Spain - aged for 14 months in French oak barrels. Purple in hue, its fairly reductive aromas feature blackberry and plums atop an oaky layer. Dry and almost infusion-like on the palate, supple tannins and a juicy flow convey a long-lasting, pleasant finish.

Name: Rock View Chardonnay Reserve Mendocino by Rob Lloyd, 2023
Product_Highlights: Beverage Dynamics-Mendocino, CA - Butterscotch and vanilla welcome you to the glass but it is less buttery than your nose would have you think. Bright green apple and tropical fruits like melon greatly balance out the oak on this wine.

Name: Tesoro della Regina Pinot Grigio
Product_Highlights: Italy - A sunny day. An empty glass. How about a new Pinot Grigio? If you are into brilliant, bright flavors of green apple, citrus and minerality, search no more. We think this treasure is a terrific value from Northern Italy that's sure to be your new go-to.

Name: Buttercream Chardonnay
Product_Highlights: California - Big and buttery. Decadent and excellent with scallops, bacon, cream. Same story with grilled salmon. Sip on the dock, the backyard, the front porch. Bliss. Vegan

Name: King Maui Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc, 2024
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-New Zealand - Marlborough - Tropical aromas of gooseberries, nectarines and papayas. The palate is light-bodied with lemon peel, passion-fruit curd and cut grass. Well-balanced and pure...

Name: Domaine Salmon Sancerre Sauvignon Blanc
Product_Highlights: Sancerre, Loire Valley, France- Made from old vines, which intensifies the flavor, this estate-bottled wine is a fine expression of Sauvignon Blanc. Refreshingly zesty with crisp notes of citrus and minerals, dry and complex. Enjoy with soft cheeses like goat cheese.

Name: Val Do Sosego Albariño Rias Baixas, 2022
Product_Highlights: James Suckling-Spain - Rias Baixas - Grapefruit, melon, bananas and fresh pineapples on the nose. Some salty undertones. Fruity and tropical with a medium body, bright acidity and good length, too.

Name: River Road Chardonnay Sonoma, 2022
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-California - Sonoma - Clean and crisp with lovely tropical fruit flavors. Balanced oak integration with vanilla notes. Perfect for seafood and poultry dishes.

Name: Governors Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Product_Highlights: New Zealand - Marlborough - Classic Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc with tropical fruit flavors and herbaceous notes. Crisp acidity and clean finish perfect for summer sipping.

Name: Gabrielle Vivien Chablis
Product_Highlights: France - Chablis - Classic French Chablis with mineral-driven character and crisp acidity. Clean and elegant expression of Burgundian Chardonnay.

Name: Bougrier V Vouvray Chenin Blanc, 2022
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-France - Loire Valley - Vouvray - Fresh and vibrant Chenin Blanc with apple and honey notes. Off-dry style perfect for spicy foods and Asian cuisine.

Name: Armani Pinot Grigio Venezie
Product_Highlights: Italy - Venezie - Classic Italian Pinot Grigio with fresh apple and pear flavors. Clean and crisp with a refreshing finish.

Name: Bishop Pine Chardonnay California, 2023
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-California - Unoaked Chardonnay with fresh apple and pear flavors. Light and crisp style perfect for everyday drinking.

Name: River Road Chardonnay Russian River Valley Reserve, 2023
Product_Highlights: Wine Spectator-California - Russian River Valley - Premium Chardonnay with tropical fruit flavors and elegant oak integration. Complex and well-balanced.

Name: Kupelwieser Pinot Grigio Alto Adige
Product_Highlights: Italy - Alto Adige - Premium Pinot Grigio from Northern Italy with crisp apple and mineral notes. Clean and refreshing mountain wine.

Name: Albino Armani Pinot Grigio Corvara, 2022
Product_Highlights: Wine Enthusiast-Italy - Veneto - Elegant Pinot Grigio with fresh apple and citrus flavors. Well-structured with good length and complexity.

Name: Grand Sud Sauvignon Blanc
Product_Highlights: France - Languedoc - Value-driven French Sauvignon Blanc with fresh citrus and herb flavors. Clean and crisp everyday white wine.

Name: Bougrier Famille Sauvignon Blanc Vin de France
Product_Highlights: France - Loire - Classic French Sauvignon Blanc with fresh citrus and herbaceous notes. Crisp and refreshing.

Name: Mato Bay Reserve Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc
Product_Highlights: New Zealand - Marlborough - Reserve Sauvignon Blanc with intense tropical fruit flavors and crisp acidity. Classic Kiwi style.

Name: 69 Miles Chardonnay by Rob Lloyd
Product_Highlights: California - Expert Pick Rob Lloyd Chardonnay with tropical fruit flavors and oak integration. Rich and full-bodied style.

Name: "Whispering Angel Côtes de Provence Rosé, 2024"
Product_Highlights: France - Cotes de Provence - The original premium Provence rose with delicate strawberry and citrus flavors. Light and refreshing with elegant minerality.

Name: "La Crema Pinot Noir Rosé Sonoma Coast, 2024"
Product_Highlights: California - Sonoma Coast - Premium Pinot Noir rose with bright strawberry and cherry flavors. Crisp and elegant with good structure.

Name: "Miraval Côtes de Provence Rosé, 2024"
Product_Highlights: France - Cotes de Provence - Jolie-Pitt family rose with peach and grapefruit flavors and herbal notes. Classic Provence style with mineral finish.

Name: "Beringer White Zinfandel, 2024"
Product_Highlights: California - Classic American White Zinfandel with sweet strawberry and watermelon flavors. Perfect for casual sipping.

Name: "Caves d'Esclans Whispering Angel Rose"
Product_Highlights: France - Provence - Premium Provence rose with red fruit and citrus flavors and distinctive mineral character. Elegant and sophisticated.

Name: "Kendall-Jackson Vintner's Reserve Rose"
Product_Highlights: California - Premium California rose with strawberry, peach, and spice flavors. Well-structured with good complexity.

Name: "Chateau d'Esclans Rock Angel Rose"
Product_Highlights: France - Provence - Ultra-premium Provence rose with intense strawberry and grapefruit flavors. Complex and age-worthy.

Name: "Sutter Home White Zinfandel"
Product_Highlights: California - America's favorite White Zinfandel with sweet cherry and strawberry flavors. Easy-drinking and approachable.

Name: "Minuty M de Minuty Rose Cotes de Provence"
Product_Highlights: France - Provence - Classic Provence rose with grapefruit, peach and herbal notes. Crisp and refreshing with mineral finish.

Name: "Josh Cellars Rosé, 2024"
Product_Highlights: California - Fresh and fruity rose with watermelon, strawberry and citrus flavors. Light and easy-drinking.

Name: "Oyster Bay Rose New Zealand"
Product_Highlights: New Zealand - Marlborough - Pinot Noir rose with cherry, strawberry and citrus flavors. Clean and crisp Kiwi style.

Name: "Campo Viejo Rose Tempranillo"
Product_Highlights: Spain - Rioja - Spanish Tempranillo rose with cherry, strawberry and spice flavors. Dry and refreshing.

Name: "Bogle Rose California"
Product_Highlights: California - Fresh and vibrant rose with strawberry, watermelon and peach flavors. Well-balanced and food-friendly.

Name: "Chateau Ste. Michelle Rose Columbia Valley"
Product_Highlights: Washington - Columbia Valley - Washington State rose with cherry, watermelon and citrus flavors. Clean and refreshing.

Name: "Gerard Depardieu Rose de France"
Product_Highlights: France - Loire Valley - Anjou rose with berry, floral and mineral notes. Elegant French style with good structure.

Name: "Mateus Rose Original"
Product_Highlights: Portugal - Vinho Verde - Classic Portuguese rose with berry, citrus and floral flavors. Slightly sweet and refreshing.

Name: "Angeline Rose California"
Product_Highlights: California - Fresh and fruity rose with strawberry, watermelon and citrus flavors. Light and easy-drinking.

Name: "Santa Margherita Rose Pinot Grigio"
Product_Highlights: Italy - Veneto - Italian Merlot rose with cherry, strawberry and herbal notes. Elegant and food-friendly.

Name: "Cloudy Bay Te Koko Pinot Noir Rose"
Product_Highlights: New Zealand - Marlborough - Premium Pinot Noir rose with strawberry, cherry and spice flavors. Complex and well-structured.

Name: "Banfi Col di Sasso Rose"
Product_Highlights: Italy - Tuscany - Sangiovese rose with cherry, strawberry and mineral notes. Classic Italian style.

Name: "Emmolo Rose Napa Valley"
Product_Highlights: California - Napa Valley - Premium Pinot Noir rose from Caymus with strawberry, peach and vanilla flavors. Elegant Napa style.

Name: "Apothic Rose California"
Product_Highlights: California - Semi-sweet rose blend with strawberry, peach and spice flavors. Smooth and approachable.

Name: "Bolla Pinot Grigio Rose delle Venezie"
Product_Highlights: Italy - Veneto - Pinot Grigio rose with cherry, citrus and floral notes. Light and refreshing Italian style.

Name: "Studio by Miraval Rose"
Product_Highlights: France - Provence - Studio line from Miraval with grapefruit, strawberry and herbal flavors. Fresh Provence style.

Name: "19 Crimes Cali Rose by Snoop Dogg"
Product_Highlights: Australia - South Australia - Australian rose blend with berry, citrus and spice flavors. Bold and distinctive.

Name: "Barefoot Pink Moscato"
Product_Highlights: California - Sweet pink Moscato with peach, apricot and honey flavors. Light and refreshing dessert wine.

Name: "AIX Rose"
Product_Highlights: France - Provence - Classic Provence rose with strawberry, grapefruit and mineral flavors. Elegant and sophisticated.

Name: "Rombauer Rose of Carneros"
Product_Highlights: California - Carneros - Premium Pinot Noir rose with strawberry, cherry and spice flavors. Rich and complex Carneros style.

Name: "Mionetto Pinot Grigio Rose Veneto"
Product_Highlights: Italy - Veneto - Pinot Grigio rose with strawberry, pear and floral notes. Crisp and elegant Italian style.
